sn5.2:1.2: Atha kho soma bhikkhuni pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthim pindaya pavisi.
sn5.2:1.3: Savatthiyam pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanta yena andhavanam tenupasankami divaviharaya.
sn5.2:1.4: Andhavanam ajjhogahetva annatarasmim rukkhamule divaviharam nisidi.
sn5.2:1.5: Atha kho maro papima somaya bhikkhuniya bhayam chambhitattam lomahamsam uppadetukamo samadhimha cavetukamo yena soma bhikkhuni tenupasankami; upasankamitva somam bhikkhunim gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn5.2:3.2: “ko nu khvayam manusso va amanusso va gatham bhasati”ti?
sn5.2:3.4: “maro kho ayam papima mama bhayam chambhitattam lomahamsam uppadetukamo samadhimha cavetukamo gatham bhasati”ti.
sn5.2:3.5: Atha kho soma bhikkhuni “maro ayam papima” iti viditva maram papimantam gathahi paccabhasi:
sn5.2:6.1: Atha kho maro papima “janati mam soma bhikkhuni”ti dukkhi dummano tatthevantaradhayiti.
